text:
1. Picking up the hula hoop
2. Swinging the hula hoop around the waist
3. Twirling the hula hoop around the hips
4. Moving the hips in a circular motion to keep the hula hoop spinning
5. Balancing and maintaining the hula hoop on the waist
6. Transitioning the hula hoop to different body parts (e.g., arms, legs, neck)
7. Performing tricks and maneuvers with the hula hoop (e.g., spinning it on one hand, jumping through the hoop)
8. Stopping the hula hoop by slowing down the motion and letting it drop to the ground.
